content.html: You also asked: "Can this be used against unions organizing protests against their company?" This is not a use case we have seen. We are going to do more research next week and determine if organizations rely on news and journalists to discover strikes.
content.value: You also asked: "Can this be used against unions organizing protests against their company?" This is not a use case we have seen. We are going to do more research next week and determine if organizations rely on news and journalists to discover strikes.

content.html: no, i didn't ask that, because i already know that it can. why wouldn't you research this BEFORE you released the tool? why would you publish a blog post advertising the tool that shows how it characterizes a union strike as a "risky protest"?
